official_title: Designating the week beginning August 18, 1991, as "National American Saddlebred Horse Week".

summary.text: Designates the week of August 18 through 24, 1991, as National Saddlebred Horse Week in recognition of the centennial year of the American Saddlebred Horse Association and of the role played by this distinguished breed in the history and growth of our great Nation.

titles.title: Designating the week beginning August 18, 1991, as "National American Saddlebred Horse Week".
